summary: March 22 is the 81st day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Gioseffo Zarlino  was an Italian music theorist and composer of the Renaissance. He was possibly the most famous European music theorist between Aristoxenus and Rameau, and made a large contribution to the theory of counterpoint as well as to musical tuning.
title: Gioseffo Zarlino
